title: Thai Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual Thai food place that's centrally located in Medford. Although there is not a specific menu for vegetarians/vegans, many items can be customized according to dietary preferences simply by asking the server to have the dish made vegetarian or vegan style. Has wheat-free and gluten-free choices.
